name: Gardentoy
0:
”Alexa garden toy control”
”turn station one on”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: garden toy control
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill allow to activate the irrigation with your Gardentoy controllers using your voice with Alexa. Simply install the skill, accept the terms of use, and grant access to your email. Control up to 48 stations effortlessly by name or number! Compatible with Gardentoy controllers. This skill is multi-language.
